He has the wisdom to know heaven and earth.
"Suppose someone writes one copy of this sutra.
They pass it down to others.
Their merit is as high as Mount Sumeru ...
It's as deep as the ocean.
Its merit is immeasurable.
He'll never set foot through the gates of hell in eternity.
Everywhere it's difficult to hear the words of Dharmaya.
Svāhā
